mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO VOUCHER_MAIN_OA ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, RAISER, RAISE_DATE, HOPE_DATE, EVENT_DESC, VOUCHER_TYPE, WKFLOW_ID, CHECK_ADVICE, CHECKS, IS_FINISHED, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{raiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{raiseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hopeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voucherType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wkflowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFinished,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_VOUCHER_MAIN_OA.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE VOUCHER_MAIN_OA
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAISER = #{raiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAISE_DATE = #{raiseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HOPE_DATE = #{hopeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVENT_DESC = #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VOUCHER_TYPE = #{voucherType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WKFLOW_ID = #{wkflowId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CHECK_ADVICE = #{checkAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKS = #{checks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FINISHED = #{isFinished,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
